abstract: New York City will partner with New York City FC, Adidas and US Soccer Foundation to build 50 junior-sized soccer fields in parks and on playgrounds across city over five years; $3 million partnership is meant to increase participation in sport and help young people in underserved neigbhorhoods.
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C., Adidas, the U.S. Soccer Foundation and New York City will contribute $750,000 apiece to build and maintain the fields in underserved neighborhoods.

headline.main: Project Commits $3 Million to Build 50 Soccer Fields in New York
headline.print_headline: Partnership Will Build Soccer Fields in New York

snippet: New York City F.C., Adidas, the U.S. Soccer Foundation and New York City will contribute $750,000 apiece to build and maintain the fields in underserved neighborhoods....
